57953.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>You're cornered, got it, Witch Gretzel!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57953.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「追いつめたぜ　魔女グレイツェル！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57953.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 이제 막다른 곳이다, 마녀 그레이첼!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57953.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>你跑不了了，魔女格雷策尔！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57953.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>妳跑不了了，魔女格蕾潔爾！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57954.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>It's been quite some time since you've
run away with your tail between your legs,
hasn't it?<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57954.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「むこうの世界で
　しっぽ巻いて　逃げやがってから
　ずいぶん　ご無沙汰だったじゃねえか。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57954.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 저쪽 세계에서
　꼬리를 말고 도망친 후로
　꽤나 오랜만이군.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57954.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>你在那边的世界夹着尾巴
逃跑了之后，
我们可是好久不见了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57954.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>打從妳在那邊的世界
夾著尾巴逃跑以後，
我們可是許久不見了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57955.en: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Oh, you really think you've cornered me?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57955.ja: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「フフ　追いつめたですって？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57955.ko: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 후후, 막다른 곳이라고?<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57955.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵，你说我跑不了了？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57955.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>呵呵，你說我跑不了了？<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57956.en:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>Sorry to break it to you, honey...
But I lured you here. <heart>
Ahh ha ha ha ha!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57956.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「おあいにくさま。
　あなたは　誘い込まれただけ<heart> 
　キャハハハハッ！！ <stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57956.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 그건 내가 할 말인걸.
　당신은 나에게 유인당했을 뿐이니까<heart> 
　꺄하하하핫!! <stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57956.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>你想错了。
我只是把你引到这里来而已<heart>
哈哈哈哈哈哈！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57956.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>很可惜，
你只是被我引到這裡來而已<heart>
哈哈哈哈！！ <stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57957.en: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>Grah grah grah grah!<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57957.ja: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>「グエ　グエ　グエ　グエッ！<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57957.ko: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>: 꾸엑 꾸엑 꾸에엑!<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57957.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>咕、咕、咕、咕！<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57957.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>呱、呱、呱、呱！<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57958.en:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>I wonder how long a body without a heart
can fight? Have a taste of true
helplessness!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57958.ja:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>「心臓のない　身体で 
　どれだけ戦えるか　試してあげる<heart>
　たっぷり　無力感を味わってねッ！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57958.ko:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>: 심장이 없는 몸으로
　얼마나 싸울 수 있는지 시험해 주지<heart>
　무력감을 실컷 맛보도록 해!<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57958.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>我就帮你试一试，你能用这个
没有心脏的身体战斗到什么时候<heart>
你就充分体会一下什么叫无能为力吧！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57958.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync m50180 _normal m00001>我就來試一試你能用這個
沒有心臟的身體戰鬥到什麼時候<heart>
你就充分體會一下什麼叫無能為力吧！<stop_lip_animation m50180 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57959.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「待ちやがれ！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57960.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Damn it... These tomatoes are rotten.
Can't eat 'em unless they're roasted nice.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57960.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「クソッ……腐りかけのトマトか。
　こんがり焼きゃ　食えんだろ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57960.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 젠장…… 다 썩어 가는 토마토로군.
　바짝 구우면 먹을 순 있겠지.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57960.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>嘁……一群开始腐烂的番茄啊。
要是烤得香香的还能拿来吃。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57960.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>可惡……一群開始腐爛的番茄啊。
烤得香香的還能拿來吃吧。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57961.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Tch...! Enough already!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57961.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「チッ……！　キリがねえな。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57961.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 쳇……! 끝이 없잖아.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57961.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>嘁！真是没完没了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57961.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>嘖……！這沒完沒了啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57962.en: <center>Your heart is broken and forever lost.
57962.ja:
<center>あなたの心臓は
壊れてしまって　永遠に失われるの。
57962.zh-Hans:
<center>你的心脏已经毁了，
你已经永远地失去它了。
57962.zh-Hant:
<center>你的心臟已毀，
你已經永遠失去它了。

57963.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Even though it's gone, I can still feel
the pain... It's tough having a body
with no heart.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57963.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「カラッポのくせに　うずきやがる。
　さすがに　心臓のねえ身体は　きついぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57963.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 텅 비어 있는 주제에 욱신거리다니.
　확실히 심장이 없는 몸으로는 버겁군.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57963.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>明明里面什么都没有了，居然还是会觉得心痛。
没有心脏的身体还真是很吃力。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57963.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>裡面明明是空的，居然還會覺得心痛。
沒有心臟的身體還真是吃力。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57964.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...<cs_pchero>! You came at a good time, didn't ya.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57964.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……<cs_pchero>！
　いい時に　来てくれんじゃねえか。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57964.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: ……<cs_pchero>!
　마침 잘 왔다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57964.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>！
你来的正好。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57964.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……<cs_pchero>！
你來得正好。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57965.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Sorry, but I need your help splatting the Witch's
rotten tomatoes!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57965.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「すまねえが　魔女のトマトどもを
　けちらしてくれ！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57965.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 미안하지만 마녀의 토마토들을
　해치워 줘!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57965.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>不好意思，
快帮我把魔女的番茄们打飞！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57965.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>不好意思，幫我打飛這群
魔女的番茄吧！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57966.en: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>GRAH GRAH GRAAAAAAH!!<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57966.ja: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>「グエ　グエ　グエーーーーー！！<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57966.ko: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>: 꾸엑 꾸엑 꾸에에에에엑!!<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57966.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>咕、咕、咕、咕！<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57967.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>! Splatter the Witch's rotten tomatoes!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57967.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>！
　魔女のトマトどもを　けちらしてくれ！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57967.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>!
　마녀의 토마토들을 해치워 줘!<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57967.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！
快帮我把魔女的番茄们打飞！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57967.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！
幫我打飛這群魔女的番茄！<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57968.en: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>GRAH GRAH GRAAAAAAH!!<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57968.ja: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>「グエ　グエ　グエーーーーー！！<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57968.ko: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>: 꾸엑 꾸엑 꾸에에에에엑!!<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57968.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync m00603 _normal m00001>咕、咕、咕、咕！<stop_lip_animation m00603 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57969.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...Serves y'all right, don't it.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57969.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……ざまぁねえな。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57969.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……真丢人啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57969.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……實在太難看了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57970.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>I assumed I had the Witch cornered, but it was a
trap for me. A party of Nightmare Tomatoes, eh.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57970.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「魔女を追いつめたつもりが　罠にかけられてよ。 
　悪夢のトマトパーティーだったぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57970.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 마녀를 막다른 곳으로 몰려다가 함정에
　걸리고 말았어. 악몽의 토마토 파티였다.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57970.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我本以为自己追上了魔女，没想到却中了她的陷阱。
真是噩梦般的番茄聚会啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57970.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>還以為把魔女逼入絕境，卻中了她的圈套。 
真是一場惡夢般的番茄派對啊。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57971.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Thanks, <cs_pchero>. You, as always, totally
saved me.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57971.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「ありがとよ　<cs_pchero>。
　お前には　いつも　助けられちまうな。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57971.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 고맙다, <cs_pchero>.
　네게는 늘 도움만 받는군.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57971.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>谢谢你，<cs_pchero>。
我总是得到你的帮助。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57971.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>謝謝你啦，<cs_pchero>。
我老是受到你的幫助呢。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57972.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Oh yeah, that gloomy girl... Airi, is she doing okay?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57972.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「そうだ　あの　クチうるさい娘……
　アイリは　元気にやってんのか？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57972.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 아, 그 잔소리꾼 아가씨……
　애일리는 잘 지내나?<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57972.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>对了，那个吵人的小姑娘……
爱丽还好吗？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57972.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>對了，那個囉嗦的小姑娘……
愛麗她還好嗎？<yesno><close><stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57973.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>...Is that right. Well, if it's that young lady, I'm
sure she'll be just fine.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57973.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「……そうか。まあ
　あの嬢ちゃんなら　大丈夫だろ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57973.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: ……그렇군. 하긴
　그 아가씨라면 걱정할 필요 없겠지.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57973.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……是吗。嗯，
那个小姑娘肯定没事的。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57973.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>……這樣啊。嗯，
她一定沒問題的。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57974.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>Since I returned to this world, I've been in Melsandy
Village, searchin' for the Witch's stronghold.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57974.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「俺は　こっちの世界に帰ってから
　メルサンディ村を　拠点にして
　魔女を探してたんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57974.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 난 이쪽 세계에 돌아온 후로
　메르상디 마을을 거점 삼아
　마녀를 찾고 있었어.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57974.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我回到这边的世界之后，
一直以梅尔桑蒂村为据点
寻找魔女。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57974.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我回到這邊的世界以後，
就以梅爾桑蒂村為據點
尋找著魔女。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57975.en: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>But this time, I'm beat, see.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57975.ja: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「だが　今回は　まいったぜ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57975.ko: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 하지만 이번에는 한 방 먹었군.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57975.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>但是这次我不行了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57975.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>但這次真的不行了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57977.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>As you already know, my heart was destroyed by the
Witch.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57977.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「お前も　知っているように
　俺の心臓は　魔女によって壊された。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57977.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 너도 알다시피
　내 심장은 마녀가 망가뜨렸지.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57977.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>你也知道，
我的心脏被魔女毁掉了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57977.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>你也知道，
我的心臟被魔女毀掉了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57978.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>This body ain't got a heart. So, I'm forcin' it to
move, and it's getting worn out.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57978.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「この身体には　心臓がねえ。
　そこを　無理に動かしてるもんだから
　ガタが来てやがるんだ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57978.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 이 몸에는 심장이 없어.
　그런데 무리해서 움직이다 보니
　삐걱거리는 상황이야.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57978.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>这个身体里没有心脏。
我勉强行动，
终于还是出问题了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57978.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>這個身體裡面沒有心臟，
我勉強行動，
終於還是出問題了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57979.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>But, y'know... The source of my strength is the
villagers' hope. As long as they believe in me, I'm
immortal. Don't you worry.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57979.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「だがな……俺のチカラの源は　村人たちの希望。
　あいつらが　信じてくれる限り　俺は不死身だ。
　心配は　いらねえよ。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57979.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 내 힘의 원천은 사람들의 희망.
　마을 사람들이 믿어 주는 한, 나는 불사신이다.
　걱정하지 않아도 돼.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57979.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>但是……村民们的希望就是我的力量源泉。
只要他们还相信我，我就是不死之身。
你不用担心。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57979.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>不過……村民的希望就是我力量的來源，
只要他們還相信我，我就是不死之身，
你不用擔心。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57980.en:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>I ain't lettin' the Witch do as she likes any longer.
While there's still time, I'm goin' after her, got
it. Well, see ya.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57980.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>「これ以上　あの魔女の　好きにはさせねえ。 
　まだ　気配が残ってるうちに追うぜ。
　じゃあな。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57980.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>: 더는 마녀가 멋대로 굴게 두지 않겠어.
　아직 기척이 남아 있을 때 추적할 거다.
　그럼 이만.<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57980.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>我不能让魔女继续为所欲为。
我要趁她的气息还没消失前追上她。
再见了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57980.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02090 _normal m00001>不能再讓那個魔女為所欲為了， 
我要在她的氣息消失前追上她。
再見了。<stop_lip_animation n02090 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57981.en: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>THE GENIUS FAIRY TALE AUTHOR, PAMPANINI!!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57981.ja: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「天才童話作家　パンパニーニじゃ！！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57981.ko: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 천재 동화 작가 팡파니니라네!!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57981.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>我就是天才童话作家庞帕尼涅！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57981.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>我就是天才童話作家，龐帕尼涅！！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57982.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>I'm the one responsible for writing the masterpiece,
"The Tale of Tiny Hero Zankrone", which remains in
Melsandy Village to this day! Wahey!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57982.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「メルサンディ村に残る　名作
　『小さな英雄ザンクローネの物語』を描いた
　張本人である！　ウォッホン！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57982.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 메르상디 마을에 전해 내려오는 명작
　『작은 영웅 장크로네 이야기』를 집필한
　장본인이지! 에헴!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57982.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>就是那本流传在梅尔桑蒂村的名作
《小英雄赞库罗尼的故事》的作者本人！
哈哈！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57982.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>就是那本在梅爾桑蒂村流傳的名作
《小英雄桑克朗的故事》的作者本人！
咳哼！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57983.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001><pc>, it appears you are already aware that this
village is not the true Melsandy Village, right?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57983.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「<pc>。おぬし　この村が 
　本当の　メルサンディ村でないことは
　とっくに　気づいておるんじゃろ？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57983.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: <pc>. 자네는 이 마을이
　진짜 메르상디 마을이 아니라는 걸
　이미 깨달았겠지?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57983.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001><pc>，你早就已经注意到
这里不是真正的
梅尔桑蒂村了吧？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57983.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001><pc>，你早就察覺到
這裡不是真正的
梅爾桑蒂村了吧？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57984.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>As you might've guessed, this village is the Great
Demon King's recreation of the Melsandy Village
depicted in my fairy tale.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57984.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「お察しの通り　この村は　大魔王によって 
　わしの描いた童話の世界が　再現された
　物語の中の　メルサンディ村じゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57984.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 짐작한 대로 이 마을은 대마왕의 손으로
　내가 그린 동화 속 세계를 재현한
　이야기 속의 메르상디 마을일세.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57984.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>你的猜想是对的，这个村子是大魔王创造的。
它再现了我的童话中的世界，
是故事中的梅尔桑蒂村。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57984.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>你猜得沒錯，這裡是大魔王打造出來的，
是我筆下童話裡的世界，
在故事中出現的梅爾桑蒂村。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57985.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>Hmph! Because I died in the middle of writing it,
Zankrone lost and met his end; he must have liked
the tragic ending, didn't he.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57985.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「フン！　わしが描いてる途中で　死んだせいで 
　ザンクローネの敗北で終わってしまった
　悲劇的な結末が　お気に召したのじゃろうよ。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57985.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 흥! 내가 이야기를 끝맺지 못하고 죽은 탓에
　장크로네의 패배로 끝나 버린
　비극적인 결말이 마음에 들었던 모양이야.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57985.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>嗯！我还没有写完故事就死了，
害得赞库罗尼也落得个失败的结局。
大魔王也许是看上了这个悲剧的结局吧。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57985.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>哼！我寫到一半就死了，
害得故事就停留在桑克朗的失敗，
大魔王也許是看上了這個悲劇的結局吧。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57986.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>As for why I am in this world... To tell you the truth,
I secretly introduced parts of myself as cameos into
my work.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57986.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「そんな　わしが　この世界にいる理由じゃが 
　……じつは　自分の分身を　作品の中に
　こっそり登場させるのが　わしの作風でな。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57986.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 그런 내가 이 세계에 있는 이유는
　……사실 내 분신을 작품 속에
　몰래 등장시키는 게 내 작품의 특징이라네.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57986.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>而我之所以会在这个世界里……
其实是因为我有让自己的分身
在作品中悄悄登场的习惯。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57986.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>而我之所以會在這個世界裡
……其實是因為我寫作有個習慣，
會悄悄讓自己的分身在作品中登場。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57987.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>For that reason, somehow when this village was
created, it seems that my soul found its way here and
transformed into this part of me.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57987.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「そのせいで　どうやら　この村が作られた時に 
　わしの魂も呼びもどされ　この通り
　分身に　乗り移ってしまったようなのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57987.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 그렇다 보니 이 마을이 만들어질 때
　내 혼도 소환되어서 보다시피
　분신에 빙의된 것 같더군.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57987.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>所以，在这个村子被制造出来的时候，
我的灵魂也被召唤到这里，
依附在了我的分身上。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57987.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>所以在這個村子打造出來的時候，
我的靈魂似乎也被召喚回來，
就這樣依附在我的分身上了。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57988.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>However... There's still one thing I don't understand.
Why—the tale should have ended with Zankrone's
death, so how did the story get going again?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57988.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「しかし……いまひとつ　解せん。
　なぜ　ザンクローネの死で　終わっていたはずの
　物語が　ふたたび　動きだしたんじゃろう？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57988.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 하지만…… 도통 이해할 수가 없어.
　장크로네의 죽음으로 끝났던 이야기가
　어째서 다시 움직이기 시작했지?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57988.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>不过……有一件事我不明白，
故事本应以赞库罗尼的死收场，
但现在却又开始继续发展下去了。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57988.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>不過……有件事我不太懂。
為什麼以桑克朗之死畫下句點的故事，
會再次往前推進呢？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57989.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>By chance, you wouldn't know if someone is writing
the sequel to the "Tale of the Tiny Hero", would you?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57989.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「おぬし　ひょっとして
　小さな英雄の物語の続きを　誰かが
　描いているのを　知っておるんじゃないか？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57989.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 자네, 혹시
　작은 영웅 이야기의 뒷부분을
　누군가가 그리고 있는지 알고 있는 겐가?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57989.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>莫非你知道
是谁在续写小英雄的故事？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57989.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>莫非你知道是誰在接著寫
小英雄的故事？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57990.ja: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「ななな　なんじゃと～～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57990.ko: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 뭐, 뭐, 뭐, 뭐라고~~~!!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57990.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>什、什、什么！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57990.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>什什什、什麼～～～！！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57991.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>My beloved grandchild, Little Airi! She took over for
me and started on a sequel to the tale...!?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57991.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「わしの愛する　孫のアイリちゃんが！
　わしの後を継ぎ　物語の続きを
　描きはじめたじゃと……！？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57991.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 사랑하는 나의 손주 애일리가!
　내 뒤를 이어 뒷이야기를
　쓰기 시작했다니……!?<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57991.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>我心爱的孙女小爱丽她！
继承了我的工作，
开始续写那个故事了？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57991.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>你說我親愛的孫女愛麗！
她繼承我的工作，
開始繼續寫那個故事了……！？<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57992.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>...I see! So that's why Zankrone appeared again, and
the story got going, is it!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57992.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「……そうか！
　それで　ふたたび　ザンクローネが現れ 
　物語が動きはじめたんじゃな！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57992.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: ……그거로군!
　그래서 장크로네가 다시 나타나고
　이야기가 움직이기 시작한 거야!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57992.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>……原来如此！
所以赞库罗尼才会再次出现，
故事也继续往下发展了！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57992.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>……這樣啊！
所以桑克朗才會再次出現，
故事也繼續往下發展了！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57993.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>*sob-sob* Poor Little Airi has discovered the joy of
creative writing... I'm overcome with emotion.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57993.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「うっうっ。あの　病弱だったアイリちゃんが
　創作の喜びを　見出してくれるとは……
　わし　感激じゃい。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57993.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 훌쩍훌쩍. 그토록 병약했던 애일리가
　창작의 기쁨을 깨달았다니……
　참으로 감격스럽군.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57993.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>哦哦，那个体弱多病的小爱丽
居然体会到了创作的喜悦……
我真是太感动了。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57993.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>嗚嗚！沒想到那個體弱多病的愛麗
居然體會到創作的喜悅……
我真是太感動了。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57994.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>Yes, I've got it! Male, Pampanini, 87 years old at time
of death! I'll watch over the story that Little
Airi is writing.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57994.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「あい　わかった！
　男　パンパニーニ　享年８７歳！
　アイリちゃんの描く物語を　見守ろうぞ。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57994.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 좋아, 결심했네!
　사나이 팡파니니 향년 87세!
　애일리가 그려 나갈 이야기를 지켜보겠네.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57994.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>好，我明白了！
男子汉庞帕尼涅，享年８７岁！
我会好好守护小爱丽写的这个故事。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57994.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>好，我知道了！
男子漢龐帕尼涅，享年８７歲！
要守護愛麗寫的這個故事。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57995.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>...Oops, I've forgotten. I never thanked you for hearing
my request. Here, please accept this.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57995.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「……おお　忘れとった。 
　頼みを聞いてくれた　礼をしとらんかったな。
　これを　受け取ってくれい。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57995.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: ……오오, 깜빡하고 있었군.
　부탁을 들어주었으니 보답을 해야지.
　이걸 받게.<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57995.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>……哦，我差点忘了。
你完成了我的委托，我要谢谢你。
请收下这个。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57995.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>……喔，差點忘了， 
你完成了我的委託，我要謝謝你。
收下這個吧。<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>

42173.ja:
クエスト『<%sEV_QUEST_NAME>』を
クリアしました！

57996.en:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>"The Tale of the Tiny Hero" that Little Airi is writing...
I'm looking forward to what's next!<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57996.ja:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>「アイリちゃんの描く　小さな英雄の物語
　……続きが　楽しみじゃのう！<stop_lip_animation n02009 CLOSE_MOUTH>
57996.ko:
<start_lip_sync n02009 _normal m00001>: 애일리가 그려 나갈 작은 영웅 이야기
